viewData.name: Lenovo 11.6" Flex 11 Multi-Touch 2-in-1 Laptop
viewData.short_description: Buy Lenovo 11.6" Flex 11 Multi-Touch 2-in-1 Laptop featuring 1.1 GHz Intel Pentium Silver N5000 Quad Core, 4GB DDR4 | 64GB eMMC Storage 11.6" 1366 x 768 Multi-Touch Display. Review Lenovo
viewData.long_description: The 11.6" Flex 11 Multi-Touch 2-in-1 Laptop from Lenovo is built to tackle everyday tasks such as browsing the nternet, composing and editing documents, streaming online videos, and more. Specs-wise, its' equipped with a 1.1 GHz Intel Pentium Silver N5000 quad-core processor, 4GB of DDR4 RAM, and 64GB of eMMC storage. While storage space is limited, you can easily attach external solutions via its USB ports as well as its multi-format card reader. Its 11.6" display features a 1366 x 768 resolution and supports multi-touch inputs to enhance its efficiency and accessibility. Moreover, the Flex 11 features a 2-in-1 design, which lets you flip the screen backwards more than normal, for alternate viewing modes. Other integrated features include 802.11ac Wi-Fi, Bluetooth 4.1, a webcam, microphones, speakers, and a 3.5mm combo audio jack. The operating system installed is Windows 10 S.
